title: Willi God AKA Only Corki is leaving us
body:
Goodbye peasants, I have a life to live.

You can dream of the day I return (Which will never be a reality)

You can remember me by this song https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HK1SpAy_cR4 "Best in the game"

Unfortunately for you all I am no longer here, if you don't know who Only Corki is you're too young for this thread.









P.S You may be lucky enough to be graced with my presence from one of my many Twitch accounts on the "Oceanic Comedy Special: Battle of the Endless Throws" (OPL) But once again this is very unlikely. (As OPL is literal Horse sht compressed into a video format and layered with infuriatingly annoying Phreak wannabes, (And Phreak's annoying enough as is.))
